** {{nbt|int|max_duration_ticks}}: The time in ticks after which the condition is no longer checked. This starts after <code>delay</code> has elapsed.
** {{nbt|int|min_speed}}: The minimum speed of the attacker, in blocks per second, along the direction that the attacker is looking. Optional, defaults to 0.0.
** {{nbt|int|min_relative_speed}}: The minimum relative speed between the attacker and target, in blocks per second, along the direction that the attacker is looking. Optional, defaults to 0.0.
